fields.name: Description
fields.description: Optional video description provided by the user. Value can be up to 2048 characters long.

fields.name: Flags
fields.description: Video flags contain information about the available video actions and its dynamic properties based on the current video state.

fields.name: MediaInfo
fields.description: Contains information about the video and audio content.

fields.name: Streaming
fields.description: Video streaming holds information about video streaming URLs.

fields.name: Title
fields.description: Optional video title provided by the user. Value can be up to 256 characters long.

fields.name: Type
fields.description: Type of the video archive. Different archive formats provide different capabilities.
